attrs.name: max
attrs.desc: Maximum score
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 5

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Read-only
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: allow-half
attrs.desc: Whether to allow half selection
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: colors
attrs.desc: icon color array, which is the color corresponding to the Threshold three segments.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is ['#FADB14', '#FADB14', '#FADB14']

attrs.name: disabled-void-color
attrs.desc: Color of unselected icons in disabled state
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #D9D9D9

attrs.name: disabled-void-icon-class
attrs.desc: Icon style name that is not selected in read-only state. Options 'icon-starDisable' | 'icon-frown' | 'icon-meh' | 'icon-smile'
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is icon-starActive.

attrs.name: high-threshold
attrs.desc: The threshold between the high score and the medium score. The value is divided into the high score.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 4

attrs.name: icon-classes
attrs.desc: Icon style name corresponding to the three segments
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is ['icon-starActive','icon-starActive','icon-starActive']

attrs.name: low-threshold
attrs.desc: The threshold value of the low score and the medium score. The value is divided into the low score.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 2

attrs.name: score-template
attrs.desc: Score display template
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {value}.

attrs.name: show-score
attrs.desc: Whether to display the current score. The values of show-score and show-text cannot be true at the same time.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: show-text
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display auxiliary text. If yes, the text corresponding to the current score is selected from the texts array.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: text-color
attrs.desc: Color of auxiliary text
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is # 666666

attrs.name: texts
attrs.desc: Auxiliary text array
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is ['poor', 'poor', 'average', 'good', 'good']

attrs.name: void-color
attrs.desc: Color of unselected icons
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #BFBFBF

attrs.name: void-icon-class
attrs.desc: Class name of unselected icons. Options 'icon-starDisable' | 'icon-frown' | 'icon-meh' | 'icon-smile'
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is icon-starActive.

attrs.name: radio
attrs.desc: Single choice for scoring other forms
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Icon font size
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 18px.

attrs.name: space
attrs.desc: Width of each icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 24px.

attrs.name: text-on-bottom
attrs.desc: Whether to display the corresponding text under the icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Bound Value
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the score changes.
